name: Hakuga
description:
My friend never clearly explained what the story is, nor he explained what the goal of the game was. I have my own interpretation as well as some hint that my friend left in the docs files, but i believe it's best to let player interpret the game story.

He had a lot of mental issues, and was diagnosed with schizophrenia, PTSD, depersonalization and major depression, some of them caused by a very heavy use of LSD.

So the "meta" story is that the game is an open viewport on the mind of a really troubled person.

Explore this virtual world built by a disturbed mind.

There is no update planned, as i want the game to remain how my friend left it, however, if there is any game breaking glitch (freeze, crash ect..) i will do my best to fix them, if you encounter any of them, please let me know.

Please remain respectful if you decide to comment, whatever you think about the game, keep in mind that it was made by someone very mentally ill, and now deceased, so in respect of his memory, i will ask everyone to remain civile and respectful.

#horror #adventure #altgame #exploration #psychologicalhorror #disturbing #analog #scifi
